attributes.additional_details: The year 11 students of Walton Le Dale Arts College and High School are taking part in an assignment to campaign for the legalisation of Euthanasia. Most people don’t know what euthanasia is… for those who don’t know; Euthanasia is the voluntary choice of ending the life of a very sick person e.g. someone who is in unbearable pain. Euthanasia is only legal in a few countries such as switzerland, belgium, albania and luxembourg.
